txt.en: The Orcs and hobgoblins are engaged in a battle in the ice-giant settlement.\n\nYou should defeat Orc-kind in Thyrstáth.
Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
While the Orcs and hobgoblins are busy fighting each other, they won't be expecting an attack from you!
Call Hórin and talk to him

'Bah! I wish I could crack some Orc-skulls with you, but I understand the need to watch the road. We wouldn't want their reinforcements to come up from behind and flank you, after all.\n\n'Kill a few for me, won't you?'
'Hah! They didn't expect us! It is always a pleasure to fight by your side, [placeholder].'
